name: 1password CLI
description: Proprietary command line tool for 1Password password manager.

name: AFICK
description: Security tool that allows to monitor the changes on your file systems, and so can detect intrusions.

name: AIDE
description: File and directory integrity checker.

name: airgeddon
description: Multi-use bash script to audit wireless networks

name: Chipsec
description: a framework for analyzing platform level security of hardware, devices, system firmware, low-level protection mechanisms, and the configuration of various platform components.It contains a set of modules, including simple tests for hardware protections and correct configuration, tests for vulnerabilities in firmware and platform components, security assessment and fuzzing tools for various platform devices and interfaces, and tools acquiring critical firmware and device artifacts.

name: Figaro's Password Manager 2
description: GTK2 port of [https://fpm.sourceforge.net/ Figaro's Password Manager] with some new enhancements.

name: GPG-Crypter
description: Graphical front-end to GnuPG(GPG) using the GTK3 toolkit and GPGME library.

name: hashdeep
description: A cross-platform tools to compute hashes, or message digests, for any number of files

name: Himitsu
description: Secret storage manager.

name: justniffer
description: Network protocol analyzer that captures network traffic and produces logs in a customized way, can emulate Apache web server log files, track response times and extract all "intercepted" files from the HTTP traffic.

name: Ked Password Manager
description: A password manager that helps to manage large numbers of passwords.

name: KeePassC
description: Curses-based password manager compatible to KeePass v.1.x.

name: Keybase
description: Key directory mapping social media identities, with cross platform encrypted chat, cloud storage, and git repositories.

name: Linux Malware Detect
description: Malware scanner designed around the threats faced in shared hosted environments.

name: MassHash
description: A set of file hashing tools (both CLI and GTK GUI) written in Python.  Supported algorithms include MD5, SHA-1, SHA-224, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512.

name: Nemesis
description: Command-line network packet crafting and injection utility.

name: Nessus
description: Comprehensive vulnerability scanning program.

name: Net Activity Viewer
description: Graphical network connections viewer, similar in functionality with Netstat.

name: Ntop
description: Network probe that shows network usage in a way similar to what top does for processes.

name: OpenVAS
description: Framework of several services and tools offering a comprehensive and powerful vulnerability scanning and vulnerability management solution. FOSS Nessus fork.

name: OSSEC
description: Open Source Host-based Intrusion Detection System that performs log analysis, file integrity checking, policy monitoring, rootkit detection, real-time alerting and active response.

name: passage
description: A fork of password-store that uses age as backend.

name: Password Gorilla
description: A cross-platform password manager.

name: Password Safe
description: Simple and secure password manager.

name: pwsafe
description: Unix command-line program that manages encrypted password databases.

name: pyNeighborhood
description: GTK-based SMB/CIFS browsing utility.

name: QPass
description: Easy to use password manager with built-in password generator.

name: Quick Hash GUI
description: A GUI to enable the rapid selection and subsequent hashing of files (individually or recursively throughout a folder structure) text and (on Linux) disks.

name: Samhain
description: Host-based intrusion detection system (HIDS) provides file integrity checking and log file monitoring/analysis, as well as rootkit detection, port monitoring, detection of rogue SUID executables, and hidden processes.

name: sflock
description: Simple screen locker utility for X, based on slock. Provides a very basic user feedback.

name: Snort
description: Network intrusion prevention and detection system.

name: Spectools
description: A set of utilities for spectrum analyzer hardware including Wi-Spy devices.

name: stegcloak
description: CLI steganography tool to hide encrypted messages in plain text using invisible characters and passwords

name: steghide
description: A steganography utility that is able to hide data in various kinds of image and audio files.

name: Suricata
description: High performance Network IDS, IPS and Network Security Monitoring engine.

name: swaylock-effects
description: Swaylock, with fancy effects.

name: Tiger
description: Security tool that can be used both as a security audit and intrusion detection system.

name: tpm
description: Tiny password manager, inspired by pass, written entirely in POSIX shell.

name: Tripwire
description: Intrusion detection system.

name: tsscreenlock
description: Screen locker used in theShell. Shows music controls, and if used with theShell, also shows desktop notifications.

name: Universal Password Manager
description: Allows you to store usernames, passwords, URLs and generic notes in an encrypted database protected by one master password.

name: What IP
description: Small GTK application to get info on your IP.

name: Xplico
description: Network forensics analysis tool (NFAT), which is a software that reconstructs the contents of acquisitions performed with a packet sniffer.

name: Zeek
description: Powerful network analysis framework that is much different from the typical IDS you may know.
